name: Vulkan
description: iOS application, digitizes AGE scheduled inspection and driver forms to easy logging and exporting of data.

name: AF Physiological Event Inquiry
description: Inquiry led on behalf of Office of Chief Scientist of the Air Force, research and brief of potential wearable use in the fighter community.

name: Pandora
description: Portal containing reception and resource request forms for 5000+ annual military visitors to Andersen AFB.

name: 36 MXG Corrosion Tracker
description: Sharepoint with embedded corrosion inspection form and app that automatically calculates corrosion category, recording results in a real time dashboard.

name: Leonidas
description: Perimeter security problem analysis, market research, and system design recommendation for Andersen AFB.

name: Choronocore
description: Evaluation of corrosion prevention efforts and effectiveness in PACAF, with resulting market research and proposed commercial solution test plan.
